definition[0]: thin in an attractive or graceful way
definition[1]: small or very limited in amount or size
example[2]: The company only has a slender hope of survival.
example[3]: The Republicans won the election by a slender majority.
example[4]: We had to make the most of our rather slender resources.
explanation[0]: Slender sounds rather literary. In everyday English, people usually say slim or thin:
example[5]: I don’t know how she stays so slim.
